column1: * The [[Long Winter]] ends. Great suffering and loss of life in [[Eriador]] and [[Rohan]].<ref name="TA"/><ref name="Mark"/>
* The [[Days of Dearth]], a dreadful famine in [[The Shire]], continues.<ref>{{FR
* [[Ferumbras Took II]], son of Isumbras Took III, becomes the twenty-fourth Thain of [[the Shire]].<ref name="Took"/>

column2: Beregond]] repels the invading [[Corsairs]], then sends reinforcements to Rohan.<ref>{{TA

column1: * [[Fréaláf]], son of King Helm, slays [[Wulf]] and becomes the tenth king,<ref name="Mark"/> starting the second line of [[Kings of Rohan
* [[Saruman]] takes up his abode in [[Isengard]] with the permission of [[Beren (Steward of Gondor)
